item.title: Cool Free Stuff
item.description: I frequently encounter questions that make me wonder why they haven’t been asked before. While the answers are rarely straightforward, I’ve discovered that even if Dynamics GP doesn’t have a specific feature, there might be a free Professional Services Tool that bridges the gap. For those unfamiliar, the Professional Services team provides an array of resources and tools to both customers and partners. Partners can explore these resources at: https://mbs.microsoft.com/partnersource/resources/support/supportinformation/msdy_winwithexpressconsulting.htm
